title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1811.2 - Net State aid
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1811.2 - Net State aid

State Regulations
(a) Subsequent to
approval by HUD of the certificate of completion and of gross and net project
cost, the commissioner shall determine the net amount of State aid which the
municipality or municipal urban renewal agency is entitled to in furtherance of
the project pursuant to its contract with the State. (b) In order to enable the commissioner to
determine such amount, the municipality or municipal urban renewal agency shall
submit such documentation as may be necessary in the discretion of the
commissioner to adequately determine the difference between: (1)
the net amount of State aid which the
municipality or municipal urban renewal agency is entitled to pursuant to its
contract with the State in furtherance of the project; and
(2)
the total advances previously made under
such contract. Such difference shall be known as the "Net State

Financial Settlement". Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1811.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
